plot: While on a picnic date with his girlfriend, a young man loses his mind when he is hit on the head by a rock and seems to think that small bugs are attacking their peaceful picnic.
title: Imagination Date
plot_es: While on a picnic date with his girlfriend, a young man loses his mind when he is hit on the head by a rock and seems to think that small bugs are attacking their peaceful picnic.
plot_en: While on a picnic date with his girlfriend, a young man loses his mind when he is hit on the head by a rock and seems to think that small bugs are attacking their peaceful picnic.
